short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your agendas and get them done with a time limit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Agendussy is a productivity chrome extension that lets our generation to stay on task and get them done. ʕ ﹷ ᴥ ﹷʔ

* Why should you install it?
As a procrastinator myself, I find it very hard staying on top. 
ʕ╯• ⊱ •╰ʔ

Specially in this day and age, I consistently found myself opening the TikTok app every other minute instead of finishing my assignments/hw. But I gotchu guys♡ hehehehehe ʕつ ͡◔ ᴥ ͡◔ʔつ With this extension y’all can achieve PRE-CRASTINATION!!!! ♡

I hope people like me♡ find this app useful. ♡♡^•ﻌ•^ ♡♡
Good luck to everyone.  ฅ՞•ﻌ•՞ต

* What it does and how to use it? ♡♡♡ 
♡ It has a 25 min timer which is a classic pomodoro technique.
♡ As humans we tends find little distractions and by using this extension we can consistently focus on our daily agendas.
♡ Maximize productivity hehe :)
♡ Take breaks after every 25 min.
♡ When a task is done, you can click on that specific task to cancel it.
♡ There’s a clear button as well which can be used to delete all the tasks that are done at once. ʕっ˘ڡ˘ςʔ
♡ You can also double click a specific task if you have accidentally crossed it out for it to stay there. ʕ　·ᴥ·ʔ
♡ Tasks will still stay even if you close tabs unless you erase them.

I would appreciate any helpful feedbacks ♡ on improving this extension. ʕ•͡ɛ•͡ʼʼʔ Let your friends know about this extension and help them succeed as well ʕ　·ᴥ·ʔ人ʕ·ᴥ·　ʔ I wish y’all all the best.  <33
